scripts.start:withbuild: yarn inner:build:main && yarn inner:build:client && cross-env RUN_SERVER_FROM_ELECTRON=true                electron .
scripts.start:halfbuild:noclient: yarn inner:build:main &&                            cross-env RUN_SERVER_FROM_ELECTRON=true NO_CLIENT=true electron .
scripts.start:halfbuild:noserver: yarn inner:build:main && yarn inner:build:client && cross-env                                              electron .
scripts.start:withoutserverclientbuild: yarn inner:build:main &&                            cross-env NO_CLIENT=true                               electron . && yarn inner:start:all
scripts.inner:build:client: cd client && yarn && yarn build && cd ../
scripts.inner:build:main: yarn && node scripts/del_out_main.js && yarn inner:build:prisma        && tsc ./main/main.ts --outDir out_main && node scripts/cp_prisma_to_out_main.js
scripts.inner:build:main:packed: yarn && node scripts/del_out_main.js && yarn inner:build:prisma:packed && tsc ./main/main.ts --outDir out_main && node scripts/cp_prisma_to_out_main.js
